title: 4 Indiana schools in USA TODAY's preseason basketball top 25
text:
4 Indiana schools in USA TODAY's preseason basketball top 25 Indiana is 15th, Notre Dame 18th, Butler 22nd and Purdue 24th. Post to Facebook 4 Indiana schools in USA TODAY's preseason basketball top 25 Indiana is 15th, Notre Dame 18th, Butler 22nd and Purdue 24th. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs 4 Indiana schools in USA TODAY's preseason basketball top 25 Nat Newell , nat.newell@indystar.com 2:14 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 Crossroads Classic should be fun this year. (Photo: Star photo illustration) 165 CONNECT 24 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Indiana, Notre Dame, Butler and Purdue are in USA TODAY's preseason men's basketball coaches top 25. Indiana is 15th, Notre Dame 18th, Butler 22nd and Purdue 24th. 
Kentucky and North Carolina tied for first with 749 points. North Carolina received 12 first-place votes, Kentucky 11. 
The Big Ten is also represented by Maryland (third), Michigan State (13th) and Wisconsin (17th); the Big East also has Villanova (ninth) ranked. 
Duke (fourth), Kansas (fifth), Virginia (sixth), Iowa State (seventh), Oklahoma (eighth) and Arizona (10th) finish out the top 10. 
Gonzaga (11th), Wichita State (12th), Cal (14th), Utah (16th), Louisiana State (19th), Vanderbilt (20th), Baylor (21st), West Virginia (23rd), UConn (25th).
